sentence.Network_en: I'm no draughtsman , I'm afraid , ie no good at drawing.
The draughtsman rapidly blocked out his idea.

entry.def: A draughtsman is someone whose job is to prepare very detailed drawings of machinery, equipment, or buildings.
If someone is a good draughtsman, they are very skilled at drawing.

example.ex: This is a great drawing by one of the 19th century's finest draughtsmen.
example.tran: 这幅恢宏画作出自一位19世纪最杰出的画家之手。

means.word_mean: 1. a skilled worker who draws plans of buildings or machines
